title: BRIEF-Spectrum Metals Updates On Claim Made By Venus Metals Corp
text:
BRIEF-Spectrum Metals Updates On Claim Made By Venus Metals Corp

Commodities 17 minutes ago (Oct 18, 2019 11:56)

BRIEF-Spectrum Metals Updates On Claim Made By Venus Metals Corp Oct 18 (Reuters) - Spectrum Metals Ltd : * SPECTRUM METALS LTD - UPDATES ON CLAIM MADE BY VENUS METALS CORPORATION LIMITED * SPECTRUM METALS LTD - WILL TAKE STEPS TO EXPEDITE PROCEEDINGS WITH A VIEW TO TRIAL BEING LISTED NO LATER THAN Q1 OF 2020 * SPECTRUM METALS LTD - SPX BOARD REITERATES ITS VIEW THAT CLAIM MADE BY VENUS METALS CORP IS WITHOUT MERIT * SPECTRUM METALS LTD - COMPANY IS FURTHER CONSIDERING ANY COUNTERCLAIM IT MAY HAVE AGAINST VMC IN THE CIRCUMSTANCES

BRIEF-Spectrum Metals Updates On Claim Made By Venus Metals Corp
description: BRIEF-Spectrum Metals Updates On Claim Made By Venus Metals Corp
